xdi2.core.features.linkcontracts.template

Class LinkContractTemplate

  • java.lang.Object
    • xdi2.core.features.linkcontracts.LinkContractBase<XdiEntitySingleton.Variable>
      • xdi2.core.features.linkcontracts.template.LinkContractTemplate
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Comparable<LinkContractBase<XdiEntitySingleton.Variable>>

    public class LinkContractTemplate
extends LinkContractBase<XdiEntitySingleton.Variable>
    An XDI link contract template, represented as an XDI variable. Example addresses: +!:uuid:1234#registration{$contract}
    Author:
    markus
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
